title: Report: Jordon Hudson plans "huge bash" for Bill Belichick on Hall of Fame enshrinement day

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Report: Jordon Hudson plans "huge bash" for Bill Belichick on Hall of Fame enshrinement day
sources.description: In the days since someone leaked that Bill Belichick had been snubbed in his first year of Hall of Fame eligibility, the North Carolina coach has enjoyed an unexpected and significant amount of sympathy and goodwill.
